pkgmetadata.longdescription: # wagtail-rest-pack# wagtail-rest-pack=====Wagtail Rest Pack=====Wagtail app easing development of single page application with specific complex needs. And for fun.Deployment Backend-----------1. Push your changes2. Increment version in setup.cfg3. Start push.sh command, which pushes to repository Deployment Frontend-----------1. Increment version in package.json2. Push your changes3. run "npm run build"4. run "npm run publish"
